Package org.mapdb

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    BTreeMap.BNode  
    CacheWeakSoftRef.CacheItem  
    CC
    Compiler Configuration.
    Engine
    Engine is center-piece for managing records in JDBM.
    Locks.RecidLocks  
    LongConcurrentLRUMap.EvictionListener<V>  
    LongMap.LongMapIterator<V>  
    Serializer<A>
    Provides serialization and deserialization
    Volume.VolumeFactory
    Factory which creates two/three volumes used by each MapDB Storage Engine
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AsyncWriteEngine
    StorageDirect which stores all modifications in memory.
    AsyncWriteEngine.SerRec<E>  
    BTreeMap<K,V>
    A scalable concurrent ConcurrentNavigableMap implementation.
    BTreeMap.DirNode  
    BTreeMap.LeafNode  
    BTreeMap.SubMap<K,V>  
    BTreeMap.ValRef  
    CacheHardRef
    Cache created objects using hard reference.
    CacheHashTable
    Fixed size cache which uses hash table.
    CacheLRU
    Least Recently Used cache.
    CacheWeakSoftRef
    Instance cache which uses SoftReference or WeakReference Items can be removed from cache by Garbage Collector if
    CacheWeakSoftRef.CacheSoftItem  
    CacheWeakSoftRef.CacheWeakItem  
    CompressLZF
    This class implements the LZF lossless data compression algorithm.
    CompressLZFSerializer
    Compress everything using LZF
    DataInput2
    Wraps ByteBuffer and provides DataInput
    DataOutput2
    Provides DataOutput implementation on top of growable byte[]

    ByteArrayOutputStream is not used as it requires byte[] copying
    DB
    A database with easy access to named maps and other collections.
    DBMaker
    A builder class for creating and opening a database.
    EncryptionXTEA
    An implementation of the EncryptionXTEA block cipher algorithm.
    EngineWrapper
    EngineWrapper adapter.
    EngineWrapper.ByteTransformEngine
    Wrapper which transform binary data.
    EngineWrapper.DebugEngine  
    EngineWrapper.DebugEngine.Record  
    EngineWrapper.ReadOnlyEngine
    Wraps an Engine and throws UnsupportedOperationException("Read-only") on any modification attempt.
    Fun
    Functional stuff.
    Fun.Tuple2<A,B>  
    Fun.Tuple3<A,B,C>  
    Fun.Tuple4<A,B,C,D>  
    HTreeMap<K,V>
    Thread safe concurrent HashMap

    It uses full 32bit hash from start.
    HTreeMap.LinkedNode<K,V>  
    Locks
    Contains various concurrent locking utilities
    Locks.LongHashMapRecidLocks  
    LongConcurrentHashMap<V>
    Thread safe LongMap.
    LongConcurrentLRUMap<V>
    A LRU cache implementation based upon ConcurrentHashMap and other techniques to reduce contention and synchronization overhead to utilize multiple CPU cores more effectively.
    LongConcurrentLRUMap.Stats  
    LongHashMap<V>
    LongHashMap is an implementation of LongMap without concurrency locking.
    LongMap<V>
    Same as 'java.util.Map' but uses primitive 'long' keys to minimise boxing (and GC) overhead.
    SerializerBase
    Serializer which uses 'header byte' to serialize/deserialize most of classes from 'java.lang' and 'java.util' packages.
    SerializerCompressWrapper<E>
    Wraps existing serializer and compresses its input/output
    SerializerPojo
    Serializer which handles POJO, object graphs etc.
    SerializerPojo.ClassInfo
    Stores info about single class stored in JDBM.
    Storage
    Some common method for Storage
    StorageDirect
    Storage Engine which saves record directly into file.
    StorageJournaled
    StorageDirect which provides transaction and journal.
    Utils
    Various IO related utilities
    Volume
    MapDB abstraction over raw storage (file, disk partition, memory etc...)
    Volume.ByteBufferVolume
    Abstract Volume over bunch of ByteBuffers It leaves ByteBuffer details (allocation, disposal) on subclasses.
    Volume.FileVolumeFactory  
    Volume.LoggerVolume
    Logs write operations performed on Volume.
    Volume.LoggerVolumeFactory  
    Volume.MappedFileVolume  
    Volume.MemoryVolume  
    Volume.MemoryVolumeFactory  
    Volume.RandomAccessFileVolume
